body: @rebornjm1 Not really cheating... she wasn't dating him... she was just f***ing lots of dudes... and she was the one that raped her childhood friend... @BZo1480 The resolution is simple; she was a slut who enjoyed banging lots of men but realized that after raping her childhood friend she preferred him...
@zikakuto Honestly, that's one of my biggest pet peeves about hentai artists. Don't be lazy and use an open ending just because you don't know how to end the damn story.

Went looking around to see if there might be a tankouban with extra pages or something. Found just an author forward in the tankouban discussing the chapter. https://nhentai.net/g/22859/237/ It’s the one that’s on the date 2008/06. You can go ahead and machine translate it if you want, big block of text. But basically it’s his thought process for the story and how he views the ending, saying it rained on their relationship and it could be a good or bad ending with them splitting up or not based on whether the adversity solidifies their foundations. It’s the phrase ame futte ji katamaru, ground becomes solid after heavy rain. It means the relationship gets stronger after facing adversity. So if the rain solidifies their relationship, then they’ll have a good ending. The title is literally ame futte after all. I liked the author’s note cause it suggests we can take the ending in what direction we’d like.
I wish there was more to the story. I was hoping for some more resolution.
